top.value: You have to crash in my parent's living room for 5 years, or be homeless for 1 year. What are you going with?
Everyone in the group exchange sincere, specific compliments.
What do you hope I achieve?
Have you ever secretly rooted for my downfall on something?
What is something you like about me that you think I am self conscious about?
What would you entrust me with above anyone else?

cards.bottom: If nobody can find anything to trust you with, reveal your

top.value: Is there a song that reminds you of me? If so, what song?
Have I ever given you anything that you threw away, sold, or lost?
Do you suspect I have any hidden talents? What are they?
What is the worst pizza topping? What is the best?
You have to describe my personality with seasonings and spices. Go.

cards.bottom: The top voted answer gets to make a shot with said seasonings and spices (or the closest recreation). Whoever read the card has to take it.

top.value: I'm getting a dog. YIPPPEEEE! What kind of dog do you think I should get? Why?

cards.bottom: The most thorough answer gets a treat.

top.value: Have you ever bragged about me to anyone else?

cards.bottom: If anyone says no, they have to text someone not at this party about how awesome you are.

top.value: Have I ever had a bad haircut that you pretended was good?
What color are my eyes?

cards.bottom: If anyone doesn't know, stare them in their eyes for 30 seconds. They better know now.

top.value: The group needs to decide who most needs praising. When a conclusion is made, everyone praise this person.
Describe a way that I have impacted you that I might not know about.

cards.bottom: The most sincere answer gets a hug from the card reader.

top.value: What is the kindest thing the person to your right has done for you?
How would you describe me to a stranger?
Have you ever pity-laughed at one of my jokes?

cards.bottom: If anyone says yes, you have to take a drink.

top.value: I got a news alert that instantly makes me happy, but nobody else cares. What's the news?

cards.bottom: If anyone gets this right, the party has to listen to a 3-minute rant about this topic.

top.value: What is your favorite thing that we do together?
Tell me about a disagreement we had, and how we resolved it. Has it made us stronger?
What is your favorite memory of me?
What is something you think that I get away with, but that you never could?
What's a place where you feel at home where I would absolutely not fit in?
Have any of us ever talked each other out of something? Was it the right call?
Have you ever borrowed something from me and didn't return it? Do you still have it?
Do you think I'm capable of doing something you could never forgive me for?
Every friendship involved give-and-take. Which one am I?
How often am I confidently incorrect? Can you name a time?
If I were in a relationship or friendship with someone you hated, would you tell me?
Have you ever caught me in a lie, but didn't bring it up? When?
Was there ever a time we were both telling the same lie?
What, if anything, have I ruined for you?
What is, or would be, the worst thing about having me as a travel companion?
What would you never hire me to do?
Have you learned anything from me?
Why do you keep me around?
Be sincere. Write a dating app bio for me in 3 sentences or less.
Have you ever let me win?
Have you ever talked about me behind my back? You don't need to explain, just a simple yes or no.
How comfortable are we with one another? Give me an example.
Describe a time you lost a little bit of respect for me.
What's a bad habit that you picked up from me? What about a good habit?
What am I so inept at that it makes you feel better about yourself?
What will you never understand about me?
Do any of your friends not like me?
Someone wants to date me. What do you tell them to make sure they are prepared?
You get to screen my next partner. What are 5 questions you ask them before letting them see me again, and how do you want them to answer?
Am I too easy on people, or too hard on them?
I have 2.5 Terrabytes (this is a lot) of one category of thing downloaded on my computer. What is it?
How do you describe me to people?
Name a time you wished you could have helped me, but you weren't able to.
Am I more of an unstoppable force, or an immovable object?
Have you ever felt the need to apologize to someone because of my behavior?
What is the angriest you've ever been with me?
What's the least impressive thing you have heard me brag about?
Have any of your friends ever said something bad about me behind my back? Was it justified?
If I died tomorrow, what regrets would you have about our relationship?
Platonically, of course, Have I gotten more attractive since we met?
What is the oldest photo you have of us on your phone?

cards.bottom: If you don't have any photos of us, drink up.

top.value: When did you begin to feel you actually knew me? Was it sudden, or over time?
How has your perception of me changed over time? What did you
Have I made any significant changes to my personality since we met? Do you miss anything about who I used to be?
What phase of my life do you think shaped me the most?

cards.bottom: Drink if your most formative phase was in high school.

top.value: What is something you hope never changes between us?
What’s something you want us to do together that we haven’t yet?
If I needed to bury a body, would you help me? Would you report me? Does it depend on the body?
Why do you choose to keep me in your life? Is there something particularly unique about our relationship?
